Original pattern of 376 runs:

1011011011011011011011011011								28 = 9 * 15 + 19 * 17 = 458 months
1011011011011011011011011011011011011011011011011011		52 = 17 * 15 + 35 * 17 = 850 months
1011011011011011011011011011011011011011011011011011011		55 = 18 * 15 + 37 * 17 = 899 months

nCycles = 28 + 52 + 55 + 52 + 55 = 242
- 242 to offset, to give pattern as below:

But nMonths = 458 + 850 + 899 + 850 + 899 = 3956

This is the cycle pattern for a simpler fraction of 477/899:

Symmetrical:
1011011011011011011011011011101101101101101101101101101

1011011011011011011011011011			458 months
101101101101101101101101101				441 months
This has 28 cycles then 27, 55 in total.
Total = 899 months in the outer cycle.

101 = 17, 15, 17
